AsyncUtil.Description: Helper methods for async collections processing.

AWSClient.Description: Defines unified AWSSettings class used to build various AWS clients.
AWSClient.ReleaseNotes: Adjusted AWS SDK version to provide better compatibility.

AWSQueue.Description: Base class for connecting to AWS queue.
AWSQueue.ReleaseNotes: Adjusted AWS SDK version to provide better compatibility.

AzureBlob.Description: Base classes for connecting to Azure blob storage.

AzureClient.Description: Defines unified AzureSettings class used to build various Azure clients.

AzureQueue.Description: Base class for connecting to Azure queue.

Base64Url.Description: Implements Base-64 encoding with URL and filename safe alphabet.

Batch.Description: Extension methods for splitting collection into batches.

CheckType.Description: Provides various checks for built-in .NET types (is nullable, is enum, is enumerable etc.)

CommaList.Description: Parses comma separated text to and from list of strings.

HashBuilder.Description: Builds MD5 hash for a combination of standard .NET types.
HashBuilder.ReleaseNotes: New hashing algorithm that considers data types, nullability and avoids collisions.

NormalizedPath.Description: Normalized relative path that does not depend on the I/O implementation or operating system.

Parse.Description: Parses any string into different .NET built-in types using As<T> syntax.

PathUtil.Description: Helper methods for working with I/O and local files.

RunProcess.Description: Allows to run an external process getting output/error contents properly and without deadlocks.

SlnFile.Description: Provides methods for parsing and creating Visual Studio Solution (*.sln) files.

TypeName.Description: Can generate user-friendly .NET type name and aware of C# keywords.

VSConstants.Description: Various constants commonly used for MSBuild and Visual Studio tools.

XConsole.Description: Extends standard console providing more features like colored output.
XConsole.ReleaseNotes: PressAnyKey() will not output pressed key.

XDoc.Description: Lightweight wrapper over XDocument with easy-to-use methods for working with namespaces, element lookups, XML conversions, etc.
